item.title: Project I: Heart Disease Prediction Model
item.description: I have successfully developed and implemented a heart disease prediction model using Logistic Regression machine learning algorithm to determine whether someone has a heart disease or not. My responsibilities included: Dataset collection â€“ heart disease dataset is collected using secondary means of data collection. Importing Libraries: NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib and Seaborn libraries are to be used. Exploratory data analysis: For getting more insights about data. Data cleaning and preprocessing: Check for null and junk values using isnull() and isna().

item.title: Project IV: Northwind Dashboard
item.description: In the realm of data-driven decision-making, where every pixel holds a story, the Northwind Dashboard stands as a testament to the artistry and science of data visualization. With its three meticulously crafted sections - Overview, Category & Product, and Employee - this dashboard transcends the mundane and unveils a world of insights hidden within the data. At first glance, the Overview section beckons with its elegant simplicity. Like a panoramic view of a bustling metropolis, it presents a bird’s eye view of the Northwind dataset.
